fields.description: This sexy, seductive mix of Latin songs might be the hottest thing to ever pass through your speakers. Play it loud or play it low; either way, you'll make the neighbors jealous.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Wisin Y Yandel, J. Alvarez, Pitbull, Daddy Yankee, Alexis & Fido
fields.name: Calentura

fields.description: Born in the slums of the Santo Domingo during Trujillo's dictatorship, Bachata tells the story of the Dominican Republic. Bachata songs cover themes about unrequited love, heartbreak, and sadness.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Frank Reyes, Zacarías Ferreíra, Andy Andy, Elvis Martinez, Joe Veras
fields.name: Bachata Tradicional

fields.description: While you're shopping for this weekend's dinners, enjoy a selection of indie tracks as fresh as the produce you're buying.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Tame Impala, Wild Nothing, alt-J, Django Django, TEEN
fields.name: At The Farmer's Market

fields.description: The dance floor is empty but the real party is just getting started. Head to your next destination and continue the night out with these mysterious and sultry late-night grooves.
fields.creator: DVF
fields.featured_artists: Frank Ocean, Kanye West, Calvin Harris, Jessie Ware, Phantogram
fields.name: After Dark

fields.description: This playlist of mostly acoustic guitar-centric songs is perfect for long, relaxing nights in your bedroom. By yourself, or with someone special, listen to this until the sun rises.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Laura Marling, American Babies, Ryan Adams, The Civil Wars, Gary Clark Jr.
fields.name: Bedroom Rock

fields.description: A diverse collection of songs that are perfect for a night of wallowing in post-breakup sadness.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Elliott Smith, Daughter, Jeff Buckley, Death Cab For Cutie, Adele
fields.name: Cry Yourself to Sleep

fields.description: This is the the story of a late night urban romance. An ingenious combination of house, trip hop and forgotten pop from the '90s, this playlist moves you through the light and heavy moments of love in the city at night.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Smith & Mighty, Candyflip, Happy Mondays, The Orb, Evy Jane
fields.name: Beyond The Afterparty

fields.description: Justin Timberlake is one of his generation's most talented pop stars. Dance to the best track from Timberlake, his influences, his production teams and his contemporaries.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Justin Timberlake, JAY Z, Michael Jackson, Kanye West, Robin Thicke
fields.name: A Justin Timberlake Dance Party

fields.description: Your swimsuit, your shades, and this driving mix of smooth summer grooves and Technicolor hip hop beats. Ocean breeze or the AC. You're ready.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Kid Cudi, Daft Punk, Curren$y, Kendrick Lamar, Kanye West
fields.name: Beach-Bound Beats

fields.description: The playlist from the most creative and interesting party you've ever been to; a liberating mix of cool, uptempo, and non-traditional party music from many eras and many corners of the world.
fields.creator: Gary Gunn
fields.featured_artists: Tricky, Caribou, Clinic, Gorillaz, The Fall
fields.name: Better by the Pound

fields.description: During the late 1950s and early '60s, John Coltrane and many of his peers searched for a sound beyond bebop. This cool post-bop set, with saxophones aplenty, balances adventurousness and melody.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Kenny Burrell, Milt Jackson, Eric Dolphy, Thelonious Monk, Sonny Stitt
fields.name: Blue Trane

fields.description: Formed by Ben Lovett of Mumford & Sons, Communion Records has played a leading role in defining the rootsy and melancholy sound of today's British folk music scene. Listen to the best tracks from artists signed to the label.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Matthew & The Atlas, Michael Kiwanuka, Daughter, Treetop Flyers, Boy & Bear
fields.name: Communion Records

fields.description: Twenty years into his career, Pharrell Williams is still churning out futuristic music. Climb on board Pharrell's studio yacht and cruise through the star producer's sexiest tracks. You'll hear why he's the go-to guy for musicians in search of new sounds.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: JAY Z, Pharrell, N.E.R.D., Common, Snoop Dogg
fields.name: A Cruise on the S.S. Pharrell

fields.description: If you've ever imagined yourself heading down the highway on a Harley, with the wind whipping by and the engine roaring in your ears, this is the greasy, gritty biker bar soundtrack of your dreams.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Steppenwolf, The Doors, Creedence Clearwater Revival, The Rolling Stones, Lynyrd Skynyrd
fields.name: Biker Bar Beats

fields.description: Got an insatiable appetite for spine-chilling bass lines? Draw the shades and indulge your dark side with this spooky mix of heavy glitch-hop arrangements.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Lokid, Robotic Pirate Monkey, Arch Nemesis, Kraddy, Feed Me
fields.name: Dark & Twisted

fields.description: As blue-eyed soul matured beyond its '60s roots, elements of funk, fusion and even disco beats started to percolate through the music. Come back to the decade where blue-eyed soul expanded its mind.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Bee Gees, Hall & Oates, Steely Dan, Joe Cocker, Van Morrison
fields.name: Blue Eyed Soul: The '70s

fields.description: Doing a whole lotta nothing. Kicking back. Chilling on the couch. This mix of smooth hip hop and head-nodding electronic beats was made for that.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Mac Miller, Kendrick Lamar, Curren$y, PARTYNEXTDOOR, Gold Panda
fields.name: Chilling on the Couch

fields.description: Put your headphones on and take a stroll around the city with these new synth-pop tunes. With these electronic sounds pulsating in your ears, even the sunniest afternoon will feel like a night on the town.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Florrie, Toro Y Moi, Tanlines, Delorean, Caribou
fields.name: A Synthy Strut

fields.description: A mix of hits from today's generation of Bachata superstars. Easy listening to get you through the work week and ready to step on to the dance floor come the weekend!
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Aventura, Xtreme, Toby Love, Prince Royce, Óptimo
fields.name: Bachata Nation

fields.description: Armed with shimmering tambourines, twangy guitars, chanting vocals, and the occasional handclap, these nostalgic indie ensembles evoke memories of long nights under big skies.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: The Cave Singers, Edward Sharpe and the Magnetic Zeros, The Head and the Heart, Fruit Bats, I'm From Barcelona
fields.name: Bonfire Nights

fields.description: If you came of age during the first decade of the 2000s, rekindle those awkward memories of crepe paper and grinding in your high school gym with these bangers and slow dances.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: *NSYNC, Rihanna, The Black Eyed Peas, Christina Aguilera, 50 Cent
fields.name: At a '00s School Dance

fields.description: Nothing but the big hits from the classic rock era, optimized for going that extra mile.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Led Zeppelin, The Rolling Stones, The Who, Jimi Hendrix Experience, David Bowie
fields.name: Classic Rock Workout

fields.description: Predating punk rock by almost a decade, these garage bands defined the counter-counterculture and influenced the punk revolution. Kickstart your day with the most raucous wayback machine ever.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Frank Zappa, The Other Half, The Electric Prunes, We The People, The Seeds
fields.name: '60s Proto-Punk Blastoff

fields.description: From the time Saint Nicholas saved the fishermen to today's celebrations, music has been our companion during the holiday season. Enjoy seasonal music sacred and secular, profound and popular.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Johann Sebastian Bach, Traditional, The Christmas Revels, Pyotr Il'yich Tchaikovsky, Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
fields.name: Classical Christmas

fields.description: This playlist takes you back to an idyllic '70s pool party where the bathing suits were as small as the sunglasses were big. Stealers Wheel was blasting out of the poolside AM and funky disco gems were spinning inside on the HiFi.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Stevie Wonder, Curtis Mayfield, War, Toots & The Maytals, Michael Jackson
fields.name: '70s Pool Party

fields.description: Your sunglasses are on, your recline is perfect. Melt under the sun with good friends while listening to this mix of paisley haze, heady soul grooves, and tropical rhythms.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Frank Ocean, Tame Impala, Tommy James & The Shondells, Shuggie Otis, Sinkane
fields.name: Baked in the Sun

fields.description: Lovable burnout Jesse Pinkman became one of the best meth cooks in America, but not without a few bumps (and rails) along the way. Remember his 'Breaking Bad' evolution by blasting his favorite rap, ska, and dubstep at your next five-day house party. Bitch.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: The Notorious B.I.G., Devin The Dude, Wu-Tang Clan, A$AP Rocky, Beck
fields.name: Cooking with Jesse Pinkman

fields.description: Here are some recent and memorable film scores from powerhouse composers like Hans Zimmer, Howard Shore and Thomas Newman.
fields.creator: Gary Gunn
fields.featured_artists: Howard Shore, Thomas Newman, John Williams, Alexandre Desplat, Harry Gregson-Williams
fields.name: A-List Film Scores

fields.description: Feel-good, anthemic indie dance songs with danceable grooves, infectious hooks, and plenty of synthesizer.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Passion Pit, Two Door Cinema Club, Miike Snow, Capital Cities, MGMT
fields.name: Anthemic Indie Dance Pop

fields.description: The best rap songs of 2010.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: E-40, Starlito, Lil' Wayne, Webbie, Z-Ro
fields.name: Best Rap of 2010

fields.description: Songs about the ups and downs of snorting, smoking and dealing cocaine.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Young Jeezy, Grateful Dead, Andre Nickatina, Genesis, Guns N' Roses
fields.name: Cocaine

fields.description: This playlist was made for a thoroughly, exceedingly, genuinely, unequivocally, eminently, prodigiously, and unfathomably funky dance party. Put on your boogie shoes and don't stop 'till you get enough.
fields.creator: Miles Felix
fields.featured_artists: Stevie Wonder, James Brown, The Brothers Johnson, KC & The Sunshine Band, Curtis Mayfield
fields.name: A Profoundly Funky Dance Party

fields.description: Coined by rising young producer Porter Robinson, complextro is a glitchy subgenre of electro house that's influenced by chiptune, funky breaks, and 1980s-era analog synths.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Savant, Zedd, Porter Robinson, Wolfgang Gartner, OVERWERK
fields.name: Complextro Glitch Bangers

fields.description: An eclectic mix of classic songs about summer.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Queens Of The Stone Age, Billie Holiday, Nancy Sinatra, Frank Sinatra, The Danleers
fields.name: 100 Essential Songs About Summer

fields.description: Drink in the deep hues of the night sky with this collection of celestial folk and country classics. These hushed, intimate ballads are perfect for loners and lovers.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Emmylou Harris, Townes Van Zandt, Jackson Browne, Willie Nelson, Waylon Jennings
fields.name: Country Stardust

fields.description: Dust off that old Gazelle or Thighmaster, zip up your neon tracksuit, and burn off the calories with this eclectic mix of energizing hits from the 1990s.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Foo Fighters, Ricky Martin, Ace Of Base, La Bouche, Third Eye Blind
fields.name: Buns of Steel: '90s Workout

fields.description: Fanciful fantasy and romantic love combine to warm the heart in the ethereal world of animation. True love is rarely as poignant as it can be between a hand drawn (or CGI) pair of lovers.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Randy Newman, Thomas Newman, Angela Lansbury, Jim Cummings, Danny Elfman
fields.name: Animated Love

fields.description: Classic 12-inch singles from the 1990s featuring hot remixes of pop hits, extended R&B workouts, and soulful house classics.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Daft Punk, Michael Jackson, Janet Jackson, Beastie Boys, Technotronic
fields.name: '90s 12" Dance Party

fields.description: Looking for trouble? Throw on this playlist of aggressive, rafter-rattling rap, perfect for a rowdy house party that might just end in a brawl.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Young Jeezy, Rick Ross, The Game, Killer Mike, Lil Jon & The East Side Boyz
fields.name: Belligerent Party Rap

fields.description: Fitness experts agree that the perfect running cadence is 180 steps per minute. Run doubletime to this mix of hip hop songs -- all around 90 beats per minute --  and you'll keep a steady pace and reach your target heart rate without hitting the wall.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: JAY Z, A Tribe Called Quest, The Notorious B.I.G., Kanye West, 2Pac
fields.name: 90 BPM Hip Hop Running Mix

fields.description: The worlds of rap and sports have always collided. Here's a round-up of the best rap songs about sports, the tracks with the best references to sports stars, and even a few cases of athletes (Shaq!) stepping up to the mic themselves.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: John Cena, Public Enemy, Allen Iverson, A Tribe Called Quest, Shaquille O'Neal
fields.name: Can They Kick It?

fields.description: Building upon the wealth of '90s R&B artists who perfected the modern slow jam, R&B artists in the '00s added their own synthetic flourishes to rhythms that bluntly force you to get down.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Usher, Mario, Chris Brown, Jagged Edge, Miguel
fields.name: '00s Slow Jams

fields.description: Cool, confident, sharp, and smart party music for punk divas and new wave dandies who wanna dance.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Blondie, Yeah Yeah Yeahs, The Raveonettes, Patti Smith Group, The White Stripes
fields.name: Cool Like Debbie Harry

fields.description:
A collection of chill, easy-going sounds from contemporary surfer-style artists. Listen to this and 
feel the sand between your toes as you lie out under the summer sun.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Jack Johnson, Eric Hutchinson, Jason Mraz, Xavier Rudd, Donavon Frankenreiter
fields.name: Barefoot Beach Chill

fields.description: These classic and contemporary songs bear the unmistakable influence of the Fab Four. You'll hear songs from fans who started bands and tracks from close Beatles associates, along with a few solo cuts from the Liverpool Lads themselves.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Harry Nilsson, George Harrison, The Raspberries, Tame Impala, Big Star
fields.name: Beatlesque

fields.description: Get more bang for your twang! This fast-paced modern country soundtrack is perfect for your cardio workout. Get your heart pumping to some of Nashville's most infectious tunes.
fields.creator: Fitness Magazine
fields.featured_artists: Gretchen Wilson, Randy Houser, Josh Thompson, James Otto, Gary Allan
fields.name: Country Cardio Workout

fields.description: These fun and upbeat songs from the alternative side of the pop music spectrum will keep you energized while you exercise.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Empire Of The Sun, Icona Pop, Imagine Dragons, The Temper Trap, Phoenix
fields.name: Alt-Pop Workout

fields.description: Inspired by the classic beach party movies of the 1960s, this collection of surf rock, pop, and doo-wop music is perfect for riding waves or doing the twist by a beach-side bonfire.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: The Kingsmen, The Routers, The Beach Boys, Bobby Fuller Four, Nancy Sinatra
fields.name: Beach Blanket Bingo

fields.description: This playlist tells the story of the King of Pop as it plays out on the dancefloor -- from his closest contemporaries in the late '70s disco scene to those who follow, bravely, in his mesmerizing footsteps.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: Michael Jackson, Justin Timberlake, Jackson 5, The Jacksons, Janet Jackson
fields.name: A Michael Jackson Dance Party

fields.description: This uplifting mix of vocal drum 'n' bass will power you through the final leg of your daily grind. Skip the coffee and energy drinks; experience a more healthful buzz with a massive dose of synth stabs, arpeggios, and bass drums.
fields.creator: Songza
fields.featured_artists: London Elektricity, Rusko, BCee, High Contrast, Logistics
fields.name: Bouncy Bass Nod
